The null hypothesis intraoperative infusion Ringer 's Lactate caesarean section Mulago Hospital result 30 % less mean maternal neonatal pH change intraoperative infusion normal saline .
DOC.brief_title: Ringer 's Lactate Versus Normal Saline Caesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: Fluid therapy caesarean section surgery Mulago Hospital do mostly 0.9 % normal saline ( NS ) . Several study highlight complication associate large infusion normal saline . Few study compare effect alternative crystalloid , Ringer 's Lactate ( RL ) , perinatal pH postoperative morbidity caesarean section surgery . This trial perform Mulago Hospital Labour Ward theatre parturients consent schedule either elective emergency caesarean section spinal anaesthesia September 2011 May 2012 . Study fluid administer intraoperatively . Preoperative postoperative venous blood sample draw venous blood gas , serum urea creatinine . Placental umbilical arterial cord blood also draw neonatal arterial blood gas . Mothers follow 24 hour incidence postoperative morbidity .
DOC.criteria: All parturients consent study . Up American Society Anesthesiology ( ASA ) class ІІ/E . Failed spinal anaesthesia convert general anaesthesia .
